DOC.brief_summary: To assess compare performance HR HPV HC2® test ( Qiagen/Digene ) APTIMA® HPV Assay ( Hologic ) use LBC Specimens ( ThinPrep® Pap Test ) detection HPV infection high-grade CIN lesion screen population woman 30 year age old Germany .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation APTIMA® HPV Assay Comparison With HR HC2® Test Using LBC ThinPrep® Specimens
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct area Tuebingen , Freiburg Saarbruecken Germany . In total , 10.000 ThinPrep® LBC cervical sample collect June 2009 May 2012 . Liquid base cytology ( LBC ) perform central laboratory Saarbruecken . Human papilloma virus ( HPV ) test HR HPV HC2® test APTIMA® HPV Assay perform Section Experimental Virology , Institute Medical Virology , University Clinic Tuebingen , Germany ( UKT ) . Within follow-up phase woman test positive test baseline monitor period 5 year . Study close visit : In addition , approximately 5 year baseline ThinPrep® LBC cervical sample collect random sample 4000 study participant test triple negative baseline determination longitudinal negative predictive value ( NPV ) HPV related disease 5 year period . Women test positive test undergo colposcopy .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Women age 30 60 year Women attend gynaecological practice routine screen Women give inform consent participation study Exclusion criterion : Women hysterectomy known destructive therapy cervix Women pregnant Women abnormal cytology result previous 6 month Women know HIV infection history transplant Women vaccinate HPV Women participate another research protocol
